message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us in the first round.
Your split was unfair to me. I'm offering a more balanced deal considering the inflation. Take it or lose more in the next round.
The value decreases rapidly.  I'm offering you 4500.  It's better to take a decent offer now than risk getting even less later.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  If you reject, I'm aiming for a much larger share in the following rounds.
